ygData.subject: late introduciton
ygData.msgSnippet: hi ive been on this list for months now, but have only commented a few times and dont think i ever introduced my self.  my apologies ive been playing eq sense
ygData.messageBody:
hi
ive been on this list for months now,
but have only commented a few times and dont think i ever introduced my self. my apologies

ive been playing eq sense last february and have a lvl 54 druid on the xev server.

im currently a member of the Ancient Fellowship guild and have a lvl 40 shadow knight, a level 13 chanter, a lvl 13 beast lord, lvl 8 rogue, and a lvl 7 shaman who is now my bazaar mule.

i have never played on another server but have wondered about them.
part of the reason i stayed on xev is because i dont know anyone on other servers.

i know there is at lease one server that strongly encourages roll play but have never tried it, and iver heard rumors of servers that are adult only.

i was wondering if anyone wanted to coment on what they knew about the different servers.

peace

nomad


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
